actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth

official_title: To authorize the President to award a gold medal on behalf of the Congress to Peter F. Drucker, the father of modern management, in recognition of his accomplishments as a journalist, a writer, an economist, and a philosopher.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present a congressional gold medal to Peter F. Drucker in recognition of his accomplishments as a journalist, a writer, an economist, and a philosopher.

titles.title: To authorize the President to award a gold medal on behalf of the Congress to Peter F. Drucker, the father of modern management, in recognition of his accomplishments as a journalist, a writer, an economist, and a philosopher.
